original_text: The chariot officers realized that he was not the king of Israel. So they did not chase him any more.
korean_text: 병거의 지휘관들이 그가 이스라엘 왕이 아님을 보고 추격을 그치고 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: that he was not the king of Israel
So they did not chase him any more
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 더 이상 그를 추격하지 않았습니다
